snippet: Citing a harmful effect on businesses and consumer buying power, lawmakers in Denmark have repealed the so-called fat tax, which was charged on foods high in saturated fats, after just one year.
abstract: Lawmakers in Denmark, citing harmful effect on businesses and consumer buying power, repeal so-called fat tax, which was charged on foods high in saturated fats, after just one year.
lead_paragraph: Citing a harmful effect on businesses and consumer buying power, lawmakers in Denmark have repealed the so-called fat tax, which was charged on foods high in saturated fats, after just one year.

headline.seo: ‘Fat Tax’ in Denmark Is Repealed After Criticism
headline.main: ‘Fat Tax’ in Denmark Is Repealed After Criticism
headline.print_headline: Fat Foods Tax Is Repealed In Denmark
